text: "Ride It On"/"Lions After Slumber" is a 7"split single by Delays and The Veils, released in November 2003 to promote the album Stop Me If You Think You've Heard This One Before... a compilation of interpretations by current Rough Trade bands of classic songs released by the label. == Track listing == * 7" (RTRADES153) # "Ride It On" (Delays, originally by Mazzy Star) – 3:28 # "Lions After Slumber" (The Veils, originally by Scritti Politti) – 3:30 Category:Delays songs Category:The Veils songs Category:2003 singles
title: Ride It On/Lions After Slumber
